sentences.en: a high-speed car chase
sentences.cn: 高速汽车追逐

sentences.en: Do you like riding in the chase?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢骑马打猎 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ellery's return will help to chase away some of the gloom.
sentences.cn: 埃勒里的归来可以驱散一些抑郁的情绪。

sentences.en: He collared the thief after a chase.
sentences.cn: 他追上那个贼,扭住了他的领口.

sentences.en: He made to chase Davey, who ran back laughing.
sentences.cn: 他假装要去追赶一边往回跑一边大笑的戴维。

sentences.en: He was reluctant to give up the chase.
sentences.cn: 他很不情愿放弃追赶。

sentences.en: kids chasing around the house
sentences.cn: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

sentences.en: Many farmers will then chase you off their land quite aggressively.
sentences.cn: 许多农民然后就会凶巴巴地把你从他们的土地上撵走。

sentences.en: Police gave chase to the speeding car.
sentences.cn: 警察追赶那辆超速行驶的轿车

sentences.en: Police spotted the car and gave chase (= chased it ) .
sentences.cn: 警察发现那辆汽车就追了上去。

sentences.en: She ran in chase of the pram.
sentences.cn: 她跑着追那婴儿车.

sentences.en: The bigger girls used to chase me and tickle me.
sentences.cn: 比我高大的女孩过去总是追赶着胳肢我。

sentences.en: the chase after higher-paying jobs
sentences.cn: 对高薪工作的追求

sentences.en: The chase is always much more exciting than the conquest anyway.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，追求的过程总比得手更为刺激。

sentences.en: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.cn: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.en: The Martell Cup Chase was won by the evens favourite Toby Tobias.
sentences.cn: 最被同额赌注赌家看好的托比·托拜厄斯赢得了马特尔杯追逐赛。

sentences.en: The officers pulled him over after a high-speed chase.
sentences.cn: 警察们一路狂追后截住了他。

sentences.en: The police are in chase of the thief.
sentences.cn: 警察在追捕那小偷.

sentences.en: They took an invincible lead in the chase for the championship.
sentences.cn: 他们在冠军争夺赛中居于不可动摇的领先地位。

sentences.en: What can we do to chase her gloom away?
sentences.cn: 我们有什么办法能消除她的郁闷?
